title: Remove leaverbuster
body: Remove leaver buster from my account! i got 5 games for 20 minutes because my game crashed 3 times until it crashed my computer with it, this happens every fucking time a new patch comes out!

replies.body: i feel like i shouldnt be getting punished for something that isnt my fault, as ive seen, im not the only one with crashing problems, so like wtf
It was all within the same match though, it would crash, i would immeditly reconnect, then when it crashed the 4th time in that game, it took my computer with it

We can't do too much about leaverbusters here on the boards, since it takes multiple left games to trigger it and those 4 other players in each match were still left without a 5th champion. We can help figure out what caused those crashes so that it doesn't keep happening. Until we get this figured out, make sure to test all changes in custom or practice games to avoid those penalties. 

Without having too much context as to what was happening when your games crashed, it's a little hard to figure out what exactly caused it. I'd suggest starting with the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) since you specifically mentioned the game crashing. Hit me back if those steps aren't seeming to help at all and we can dig a little further with ya!
